confirm_data_clearance.message: This will delete all private bookmarks and your password, are you sure?

command_export_encrypted.description: Appears as a button that downloads encrypted private bookmark data.

command_post_feedback.description: 'issue' refers to a GitHub issue. Appears directly after feedback_label.

direction_post_feedback.message: Something's not working? Got a question and/or suggestion?

error_import_file_parse.message: The selected file could not be parsed.

error_import_encrypted.message: The import operation failed. Is the password correct for all file(s)?

extension_description.message: Enables a special password-protected bookmark folder.

import_folder_title.description: The title of a folder to host imported bookmarks.

info_export_plain_requirements.message: Exporting plain data requires unlocked bookmarks.

info_sync_data_capacity.message: The browser imposes a limit on how much data an extension is allowed to sync.

info_sync_data_capacity_exceeded.message: Syncing is suspended while data capacity is exceeded :(

info_sync_data_usage.message: Your data takes up $TAKEN_KB$KB out of $CAPACITY_KB$KB available ($PERCENTAGE_TAKEN$%).

menu_panel_error_message_addendum.message: Private Bookmarks is still in early development. Sorry for the inconvenience.

menu_panel_error_message_begin.message: Oops! There was an error. You can help by
menu_panel_error_message_begin.description: Forms one sentence together with error_message_ending

menu_panel_error_message_end.description: Forms one sentence together with error_message_beginning.

notification_item_added.message: The page has been added to your private bookmarks.

notification_locked.message: Your private bookmarks have been locked.

options_item_disable_password_requiremen.message: Disable password requirements (allows less secure passwords)

options_item_enable_sync.message: Sync bookmarks and preferences across devices

options_item_require_private_context.message: Disable Private Bookmarks outside of private browsing

options_item_verbose_update.message: Let me know what's new after an update

password_character_requirements.message: Must contain at least one letter and one number.

response_confirm_cancel_negative.description: A negative response to a confirm/cancel question.

response_confirm_cancel_positive.description: A positive response to a confirm/cancel question.

response_yes_no_negative.description: A negative response to a yes/no question.

response_yes_no_positive.description: A positive response to a yes/no question.

success_password_change.message: Your password has been changed successfully.

success_unlock.message: Your bookmarks have been unlocked! Check the '$TITLE$' folder under '$PARENT_TITLE$'.
